00051 #include "youbot/YouBotManipulator.hpp"
00052 namespace youbot {
00053 
00054 YouBotManipulator::YouBotManipulator(const std::string name, const std::string configFilePath)
00055 : ethercatMaster(EthercatMaster::getInstance("youbot-ethercat.cfg", configFilePath)) {
00056   // Bouml preserved body begin 00067F71
00057 
00058     this->controllerType = 841;
00059     this->alternativeControllerType = 1610;
00060     this->supportedFirmwareVersions.push_back("1.48");
00061     this->supportedFirmwareVersions.push_back("148");
00062     this->supportedFirmwareVersions.push_back("200");
00063     this->actualFirmwareVersionAllJoints = "";
00064 
00065     string filename;
00066     filename = name;
00067     filename.append(".cfg");
00068     useGripper = true;
00069     configfile.reset(new ConfigFile(filename, configFilePath));
00070     
00071     if(ethercatMaster.isThreadActive()){
00072       ethercatMasterWithThread = static_cast<EthercatMasterWithThread*>(&(EthercatMaster::getInstance()));
00073     }else{
00074       ethercatMasterWithThread = NULL;
00075     }
00076 
00077     this->initializeJoints();
00078     
00079 
00080 
00081   // Bouml preserved body end 00067F71
00082 }
00083 
00084 YouBotManipulator::~YouBotManipulator() {
00085   // Bouml preserved body begin 00067FF1
00086     if(ethercatMaster.isThreadActive()){
00087       for (unsigned int i = 0; i < ARMJOINTS; i++) {
00088         ethercatMasterWithThread->deleteJointTrajectoryControllerRegistration(this->joints[i].getJointNumber());
00089       }
00090     }
00091   // Bouml preserved body end 00067FF1
00092 }
00093 
00094 ///does the sine commutation of the arm joints
00095 void YouBotManipulator::doJointCommutation() {
00096   // Bouml preserved body begin 000A3371
00097 
00098   if(this->actualFirmwareVersionAllJoints == "1.48"  || this->actualFirmwareVersionAllJoints == "148"){
00099     this->commutationFirmware148();
00100   }else if(this->actualFirmwareVersionAllJoints == "200" ){
00101     this->commutationFirmware200();
00102   }else{
00103     throw std::runtime_error("Unable to commutate joints - Unsupported firmware version!");
00104   }
00105   // Bouml preserved body end 000A3371
00106 }
00107 
00108 ///calibrate the reference position of the arm joints
00109 void YouBotManipulator::calibrateManipulator(const bool forceCalibration) {
00110   // Bouml preserved body begin 000A9C71
00111 
00112     //Calibrate all manipulator joints
00113     std::vector<JointRoundsPerMinuteSetpoint> calibrationVel;
00114     JointRoundsPerMinuteSetpoint tempdummy;
00115     tempdummy.rpm = 0;
00116     calibrationVel.assign(ARMJOINTS, tempdummy);
00117     std::vector<quantity<si::current> > maxCurrent;
00118     quantity<si::current> tempdummy2;
00119     maxCurrent.assign(ARMJOINTS, tempdummy2);
00120     std::vector<bool> doCalibration;
00121     doCalibration.assign(ARMJOINTS, true);
00122     std::string jointName;
00123 
00124     double dummy = 0;
00125     char index = 16; // Parameter 0 to 15 of bank 2 are password protected
00126 
00127     YouBotSlaveMailboxMsg IsCalibratedReadMessage;
00128     IsCalibratedReadMessage.stctOutput.moduleAddress = DRIVE;
00129     IsCalibratedReadMessage.stctOutput.commandNumber = GGP;
00130     IsCalibratedReadMessage.stctOutput.typeNumber = index;
00131     IsCalibratedReadMessage.stctOutput.motorNumber = USER_VARIABLE_BANK;
00132     IsCalibratedReadMessage.stctOutput.value = 0;
00133     IsCalibratedReadMessage.stctInput.value = 0;
00134 
00135     YouBotSlaveMailboxMsg IsCalibratedSetMessage;
00136     IsCalibratedSetMessage.stctOutput.moduleAddress = DRIVE;
00137     IsCalibratedSetMessage.stctOutput.commandNumber = SGP;
00138     IsCalibratedSetMessage.stctOutput.typeNumber = index;
00139     IsCalibratedSetMessage.stctOutput.motorNumber = USER_VARIABLE_BANK;
00140     IsCalibratedSetMessage.stctOutput.value = 1;
00141 
00142 
00143     //get parameters for calibration
00144     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < ARMJOINTS; i++) {
00145 
00146       std::stringstream jointNameStream;
00147       jointNameStream << "Joint_" << i + 1;
00148       jointName = jointNameStream.str();
00149       bool calib = true;
00150       configfile->readInto(calib, jointName, "DoCalibration");
00151       doCalibration[i] = calib;
00152 
00153       joints[i].getConfigurationParameter(IsCalibratedReadMessage);
00154       if (IsCalibratedReadMessage.stctInput.value == 1) {
00155         doCalibration[i] = false;
00156       }
00157 
00158       if (forceCalibration) {
00159         doCalibration[i] = true;
00160       }
00161 
00162       configfile->readInto(dummy, jointName, "CalibrationMaxCurrent_[ampere]");
00163       maxCurrent[i] = dummy * ampere;
00164       std::string direction;
00165       configfile->readInto(direction, jointName, "CalibrationDirection");
00166       GearRatio gearRatio;
00167       joints[i].getConfigurationParameter(gearRatio);
00168       double gearratio = 1;
00169       gearRatio.getParameter(gearratio);
00170 
00171       if (direction == "POSITIV") {
00172         calibrationVel[i].rpm = 1 / gearratio;
00173       } else if (direction == "NEGATIV") {
00174         calibrationVel[i].rpm = -1 / gearratio;
00175       } else {
00176         throw std::runtime_error("Wrong calibration direction for " + jointName);
00177       }
00178     }
00179 
00180 
00181     LOG(info) << "Calibrate Manipulator Joints ";
00182 
00183     std::vector<bool> finished;
00184     finished.assign(ARMJOINTS, false);
00185     JointSensedCurrent sensedCurrent;
00186 
00187 
00188     //move the joints slowly in calibration direction
00189     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < ARMJOINTS; i++) {
00190       if (doCalibration[i] == true) {
00191         joints[i].setData(calibrationVel[i]);
00192         if(!ethercatMaster.isThreadActive()){
00193           ethercatMaster.sendProcessData();
00194           ethercatMaster.receiveProcessData();
00195         }
00196       } else {
00197         finished[i] = true;
00198       }
00199     }
00200 
00201     //monitor the current to find end stop 
00202     while (!(finished[0] && finished[1] && finished[2] && finished[3] && finished[4])) {
00203       for (unsigned int i = 0; i < ARMJOINTS; i++) {
00204         if(!ethercatMaster.isThreadActive()){
00205           ethercatMaster.sendProcessData();
00206           ethercatMaster.receiveProcessData();
00207         }
00208         joints[i].getData(sensedCurrent);
00209         //turn till a max current is reached
00210         if (abs(sensedCurrent.current) > abs(maxCurrent[i])) {
00211           //stop movement
00212           youbot::JointCurrentSetpoint currentStopMovement;
00213           currentStopMovement.current = 0 * ampere;
00214           joints[i].setData(currentStopMovement);
00215           if(!ethercatMaster.isThreadActive()){
00216             ethercatMaster.sendProcessData();
00217             ethercatMaster.receiveProcessData();
00218           }
00219           finished[i] = true;
00220         }
00221       }
00222       SLEEP_MILLISEC(1);
00223     }
00224 
00225     // wait to let the joint stop the motion
00226     SLEEP_MILLISEC(100);
00227 
00228     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < ARMJOINTS; i++) {
00229       if (doCalibration[i] == true) {
00230         //set encoder reference position
00231         joints[i].setEncoderToZero();
00232         if(!ethercatMaster.isThreadActive()){
00233           ethercatMaster.sendProcessData();
00234           ethercatMaster.receiveProcessData();
00235         }
00236         // set a flag in the user variable to remember that it is calibrated
00237         joints[i].setConfigurationParameter(IsCalibratedSetMessage);
00238         //     LOG(info) << "Calibration finished for joint: " << this->jointName;
00239       }
00240     }
00241 
00242     //setting joint Limits
00243     JointLimits jLimits;
00244     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < ARMJOINTS; i++) {
00245       long upperlimit = 0, lowerlimit = 0;
00246       std::stringstream jointNameStream;
00247       bool inverted = false;
00248       jointNameStream << "Joint_" << i + 1;
00249       jointName = jointNameStream.str();
00250       JointEncoderSetpoint minEncoderValue;
00251       configfile->readInto(lowerlimit, jointName, "LowerLimit_[encoderTicks]");
00252       configfile->readInto(upperlimit, jointName, "UpperLimit_[encoderTicks]");
00253       configfile->readInto(inverted, jointName, "InverseMovementDirection");
00254       
00255       if(inverted){
00256         minEncoderValue.encoderTicks = lowerlimit + 1000;
00257       }else{
00258         minEncoderValue.encoderTicks = upperlimit - 1000;
00259       }
00260 
00261       jLimits.setParameter(lowerlimit, upperlimit, true);
00262       joints[i].setConfigurationParameter(jLimits);
00263      // joints[i].setData(minEncoderValue);
00264     }
00265 
00266   // Bouml preserved body end 000A9C71
00267 }
00268 
00269 void YouBotManipulator::calibrateGripper(const bool forceCalibration) {
00270   // Bouml preserved body begin 000A9CF1
00271     // Calibrating Gripper
00272     bool doCalibration = true;
00273     configfile->readInto(doCalibration, "Gripper", "DoCalibration");
00274     if(useGripper && doCalibration){
00275       CalibrateGripper calibrate;
00276       calibrate.setParameter(forceCalibration);
00277       gripper->setConfigurationParameter(calibrate);
00278     }
00279   // Bouml preserved body end 000A9CF1
00280 }
00281 
00282 ///return a joint form the arm1
00283 ///@param armJointNumber 1-5 for the arm joints
00284 YouBotJoint& YouBotManipulator::getArmJoint(const unsigned int armJointNumber) {
00285   // Bouml preserved body begin 0004F7F1
00286 
00287     if (armJointNumber <= 0 || armJointNumber > ARMJOINTS) {
00288       throw std::out_of_range("Invalid Joint Number");
00289     }
00290     return joints[armJointNumber - 1];
00291   // Bouml preserved body end 0004F7F1
00292 }
00293 
00294 YouBotGripper& YouBotManipulator::getArmGripper() {
00295   // Bouml preserved body begin 0005F9F1
00296     if(!useGripper){
00297       throw std::runtime_error("The gripper is disabled!");
00298     }
00299     return *gripper;
00300   // Bouml preserved body end 0005F9F1
00301 }
00302 
00303 ///commands positions or angles to all manipulator joints
00304 ///all positions will be set at the same time
00305 ///@param JointData the to command positions
00306 void YouBotManipulator::setJointData(const std::vector<JointAngleSetpoint>& JointData) {
00307   // Bouml preserved body begin 0008FDF1
00308     if (JointData.size() != ARMJOINTS)
00309       throw std::out_of_range("Wrong number of JointAngleSetpoints");
00310 
00311     ethercatMaster.AutomaticSendOn(false);
00312     joints[0].setData(JointData[0], NON_BLOCKING);
00313     joints[1].setData(JointData[1], NON_BLOCKING);
00314     joints[2].setData(JointData[2], NON_BLOCKING);
00315     joints[3].setData(JointData[3], NON_BLOCKING);
00316     joints[4].setData(JointData[4], NON_BLOCKING);
00317     ethercatMaster.AutomaticSendOn(true);
00318 
00319   // Bouml preserved body end 0008FDF1
00320 }
00321 
00322 ///gets the position or angle of all manipulator joints which have been calculated from the actual encoder value
00323 ///These values are all read at the same time from the different joints 
00324 ///@param data returns the angles by reference
00325 void YouBotManipulator::getJointData(std::vector<JointSensedAngle>& data) {
00326   // Bouml preserved body begin 0008FE71
00327     data.resize(ARMJOINTS);
00328     ethercatMaster.AutomaticReceiveOn(false);
00329     joints[0].getData(data[0]);
00330     joints[1].getData(data[1]);
00331     joints[2].getData(data[2]);
00332     joints[3].getData(data[3]);
00333     joints[4].getData(data[4]);
00334     ethercatMaster.AutomaticReceiveOn(true);
00335   // Bouml preserved body end 0008FE71
00336 }
00337

00342   // Bouml preserved body begin 0008FEF1

00344       throw std::out_of_range("Wrong number of JointVelocitySetpoints");
00345 
00346     ethercatMaster.AutomaticSendOn(false);
00347     joints[0].setData(JointData[0], NON_BLOCKING);
00348     joints[1].setData(JointData[1], NON_BLOCKING);
00349     joints[2].setData(JointData[2], NON_BLOCKING);
00350     joints[3].setData(JointData[3], NON_BLOCKING);
00351     joints[4].setData(JointData[4], NON_BLOCKING);
00352     ethercatMaster.AutomaticSendOn(true);
00353   // Bouml preserved body end 0008FEF1
00354 }

00396     ethercatMaster.AutomaticReceiveOn(false);
00397     joints[0].getData(data[0]);
00398     joints[1].getData(data[1]);
00399     joints[2].getData(data[2]);
00400     joints[3].getData(data[3]);
00401     joints[4].getData(data[4]);
00402     ethercatMaster.AutomaticReceiveOn(true);
00403   // Bouml preserved body end 00090071
00404 }

00440 ///does the commutation of the arm joints with firmware 2.0
00441 void YouBotManipulator::commutationFirmware200() {
00442   // Bouml preserved body begin 0010D8F1
00443   
00444     InitializeJoint doInitialization;
00445     bool isInitialized = false;
00446     int noInitialization = 0;
00447     std::string jointName;
00448     unsigned int statusFlags;
00449     std::vector<bool> isCommutated;
00450     isCommutated.assign(ARMJOINTS, false);
00451     unsigned int u = 0;
00452     JointCurrentSetpoint zerocurrent;
00453     zerocurrent.current = 0.0 * ampere;
00454 
00455 
00456     ClearMotorControllerTimeoutFlag clearTimeoutFlag;
00457     for (unsigned int i = 1; i <= ARMJOINTS; i++) {
00458       this->getArmJoint(i).setConfigurationParameter(clearTimeoutFlag);
00459     }
00460 
00461     for (unsigned int i = 1; i <= ARMJOINTS; i++) {
00462       doInitialization.setParameter(false);
00463       this->getArmJoint(i).getConfigurationParameter(doInitialization);
00464       doInitialization.getParameter(isInitialized);
00465       if (!isInitialized) {
00466         noInitialization++;
00467       }
00468     }
00469 
00470     if (noInitialization != 0) {
00471       LOG(info) << "Manipulator Joint Commutation";
00472       doInitialization.setParameter(true);
00473 
00474       JointRoundsPerMinuteSetpoint rpmSetpoint(100);
00475         
00476       ethercatMaster.AutomaticReceiveOn(false);
00477       this->getArmJoint(1).setData(rpmSetpoint);
00478       this->getArmJoint(2).setData(rpmSetpoint);
00479       this->getArmJoint(3).setData(rpmSetpoint);
00480       this->getArmJoint(4).setData(rpmSetpoint);
00481       this->getArmJoint(5).setData(rpmSetpoint);
00482       ethercatMaster.AutomaticReceiveOn(true);
00483      
00484       
00485       // check for the next 5 sec if the joints are commutated
00486       for (u = 1; u <= 5000; u++) {
00487         for (unsigned int i = 1; i <= ARMJOINTS; i++) {
00488           this->getArmJoint(i).getStatus(statusFlags);
00489           if (statusFlags & INITIALIZED) {
00490             isCommutated[i - 1] = true;
00491             this->getArmJoint(i).setData(zerocurrent);
00492           }
00493         }
00494         if(!ethercatMaster.isThreadActive()){
00495           ethercatMaster.sendProcessData();
00496           ethercatMaster.receiveProcessData();
00497         }
00498         if (isCommutated[0] && isCommutated[1] && isCommutated[2] && isCommutated[3] && isCommutated[4]) {
00499           break;
00500         }
00501         SLEEP_MILLISEC(1);
00502       }
00503 
00504       for (unsigned int i = 1; i <= ARMJOINTS; i++) {
00505         this->getArmJoint(i).setData(zerocurrent);
00506         if(!ethercatMaster.isThreadActive()){
00507           ethercatMaster.sendProcessData();
00508           ethercatMaster.receiveProcessData();
00509         }
00510         doInitialization.setParameter(false);
00511         this->getArmJoint(i).getConfigurationParameter(doInitialization);
00512         doInitialization.getParameter(isInitialized);
00513         if (!isInitialized) {
00514           std::stringstream jointNameStream;
00515           jointNameStream << "manipulator joint " << i;
00516           jointName = jointNameStream.str();
00517           throw std::runtime_error("Could not commutate " + jointName);
00518         }
00519       }
00520     }
00521   // Bouml preserved body end 0010D8F1
00522 }
00523 
00524 ///does the commutation of the arm joints with firmware 1.48 and below
00525 void YouBotManipulator::commutationFirmware148() {
00526   // Bouml preserved body begin 0010D971
00527   
00528     InitializeJoint doInitialization;
00529     bool isInitialized = false;
00530     int noInitialization = 0;
00531     std::string jointName;
00532 
00533 
00534     ClearMotorControllerTimeoutFlag clearTimeoutFlag;
00535     for (unsigned int i = 1; i <= ARMJOINTS; i++) {
00536       this->getArmJoint(i).setConfigurationParameter(clearTimeoutFlag);
00537     }
00538 
00539     for (unsigned int i = 1; i <= ARMJOINTS; i++) {
00540       doInitialization.setParameter(false);
00541       this->getArmJoint(i).getConfigurationParameter(doInitialization);
00542       doInitialization.getParameter(isInitialized);
00543       if (!isInitialized) {
00544         noInitialization++;
00545       }
00546     }
00547 
00548     if (noInitialization != 0) {
00549       LOG(info) << "Manipulator Joint Commutation";
00550       doInitialization.setParameter(true);
00551 
00552       ethercatMaster.AutomaticReceiveOn(false);
00553       this->getArmJoint(1).setConfigurationParameter(doInitialization);
00554       this->getArmJoint(2).setConfigurationParameter(doInitialization);
00555       this->getArmJoint(3).setConfigurationParameter(doInitialization);
00556       this->getArmJoint(4).setConfigurationParameter(doInitialization);
00557       this->getArmJoint(5).setConfigurationParameter(doInitialization);
00558       ethercatMaster.AutomaticReceiveOn(true);
00559 
00560       unsigned int statusFlags;
00561       std::vector<bool> isCommutated;
00562       isCommutated.assign(ARMJOINTS, false);
00563       unsigned int u = 0;
00564 
00565       // check for the next 5 sec if the joints are commutated
00566       for (u = 1; u <= 5000; u++) {
00567         for (unsigned int i = 1; i <= ARMJOINTS; i++) {
00568           if(!ethercatMaster.isThreadActive()){
00569             ethercatMaster.sendProcessData();
00570             ethercatMaster.receiveProcessData();
00571           }
00572           this->getArmJoint(i).getStatus(statusFlags);
00573           if (statusFlags & INITIALIZED) {
00574             isCommutated[i - 1] = true;
00575           }
00576         }
00577         if (isCommutated[0] && isCommutated[1] && isCommutated[2] && isCommutated[3] && isCommutated[4]) {
00578           break;
00579         }
00580         SLEEP_MILLISEC(1);
00581       }
00582 
00583       SLEEP_MILLISEC(10); // the controller likes it
00584 
00585       for (unsigned int i = 1; i <= ARMJOINTS; i++) {
00586         doInitialization.setParameter(false);
00587         this->getArmJoint(i).getConfigurationParameter(doInitialization);
00588         doInitialization.getParameter(isInitialized);
00589         if (!isInitialized) {
00590           std::stringstream jointNameStream;
00591           jointNameStream << "manipulator joint " << i;
00592           jointName = jointNameStream.str();
00593           throw std::runtime_error("Could not commutate " + jointName);
00594         }
00595       }
00596     }
00597 
00598 
00599   // Bouml preserved body end 0010D971
00600 }
00601 
00602 void YouBotManipulator::initializeJoints() {
00603   // Bouml preserved body begin 00068071
00604 
00605  //   LOG(info) << "Initializing Joints";
00606 
00607 
00608     //get number of slaves
00609     unsigned int noSlaves = ethercatMaster.getNumberOfSlaves();
00610 
00611 
00612     if (noSlaves < ARMJOINTS) {
00613       throw std::runtime_error("Not enough ethercat slaves were found to create a YouBotManipulator!");
00614     }
00615 
00616 
00617     unsigned int slaveNumber = 0;
00618     configfile->readInto(slaveNumber, "JointTopology", "ManipulatorJoint1");
00619     if (slaveNumber <= noSlaves) {
00620       joints.push_back(new YouBotJoint(slaveNumber));
00621     } else {
00622       throw std::out_of_range("The ethercat slave number is not available!");
00623     }
00624 
00625     configfile->readInto(slaveNumber, "JointTopology", "ManipulatorJoint2");
00626     if (slaveNumber <= noSlaves) {
00627       joints.push_back(new YouBotJoint(slaveNumber));
00628     } else {
00629       throw std::out_of_range("The ethercat slave number is not available!");
00630     }
00631 
00632     configfile->readInto(slaveNumber, "JointTopology", "ManipulatorJoint3");
00633     if (slaveNumber <= noSlaves) {
00634       joints.push_back(new YouBotJoint(slaveNumber));
00635     } else {
00636       throw std::out_of_range("The ethercat slave number is not available!");
00637     }
00638 
00639     configfile->readInto(slaveNumber, "JointTopology", "ManipulatorJoint4");
00640     if (slaveNumber <= noSlaves) {
00641       joints.push_back(new YouBotJoint(slaveNumber));
00642     } else {
00643       throw std::out_of_range("The ethercat slave number is not available!");
00644     }
00645 
00646     configfile->readInto(slaveNumber, "JointTopology", "ManipulatorJoint5");
00647     if (slaveNumber <= noSlaves) {
00648       joints.push_back(new YouBotJoint(slaveNumber));
00649     } else {
00650       throw std::out_of_range("The ethercat slave number is not available!");
00651     }
00652 
00653 
00654 
00655 
00656 
00657     //Configure Joint Parameters
00658     std::string jointName;
00659     JointName jName;
00660     GearRatio gearRatio;
00661     EncoderTicksPerRound ticksPerRound;
00662     InverseMovementDirection inverseDir;
00663     double gearRatio_numerator = 0;
00664     double gearRatio_denominator = 1;
00665     FirmwareVersion firmwareTypeVersion;
00666     TorqueConstant torqueConst;
00667     double trajectory_p=0, trajectory_i=0, trajectory_d=0, trajectory_imax=0, trajectory_imin=0;
00668 
00669 
00670     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < ARMJOINTS; i++) {
00671       std::stringstream jointNameStream;
00672       jointNameStream << "Joint_" << i + 1;
00673       jointName = jointNameStream.str();
00674 
00675 
00676       joints[i].getConfigurationParameter(firmwareTypeVersion);
00677       std::string version;
00678       int controllerType;
00679       std::string firmwareVersion;
00680       firmwareTypeVersion.getParameter(controllerType, firmwareVersion);
00681 
00682       string name;
00683       configfile->readInto(name, jointName, "JointName");
00684       jName.setParameter(name);
00685 
00686       LOG(info) << name << "\t Controller Type: " << controllerType << "  Firmware version: " << firmwareVersion;
00687 
00688       if (this->controllerType != controllerType && alternativeControllerType != controllerType) {
00689         std::stringstream ss;
00690         ss << "The youBot manipulator motor controller have to be of type: " << this->controllerType << " or " << alternativeControllerType;
00691         throw std::runtime_error(ss.str().c_str());
00692       }
00693 
00694       //check if firmware is supported
00695       bool isfirmwareSupported = false;
00696       for(unsigned int d = 0; d < supportedFirmwareVersions.size(); d++){
00697         if(this->supportedFirmwareVersions[d] == firmwareVersion){
00698           isfirmwareSupported = true;
00699           break;
00700         }
00701       }
00702       
00703       if(!isfirmwareSupported){
00704         throw std::runtime_error("Unsupported firmware version: " + firmwareVersion);
00705       }
00706       
00707       if(this->actualFirmwareVersionAllJoints == ""){
00708         this->actualFirmwareVersionAllJoints = firmwareVersion;
00709       }
00710       
00711       if(!(firmwareVersion == this->actualFirmwareVersionAllJoints)){
00712          throw std::runtime_error("All joints must have the same firmware version!");
00713       }
00714 
00715       configfile->readInto(gearRatio_numerator, jointName, "GearRatio_numerator");
00716       configfile->readInto(gearRatio_denominator, jointName, "GearRatio_denominator");
00717       gearRatio.setParameter(gearRatio_numerator / gearRatio_denominator);
00718       int ticks;
00719       configfile->readInto(ticks, jointName, "EncoderTicksPerRound");
00720       ticksPerRound.setParameter(ticks);
00721       
00722       double torqueConstant;
00723       configfile->readInto(torqueConstant, jointName, "TorqueConstant_[newton_meter_divided_by_ampere]");
00724       torqueConst.setParameter(torqueConstant);
00725       
00726       bool invdir = false;
00727       configfile->readInto(invdir, jointName, "InverseMovementDirection");
00728       inverseDir.setParameter(invdir);
00729 
00730       joints[i].setConfigurationParameter(jName);
00731       joints[i].setConfigurationParameter(gearRatio);
00732       joints[i].setConfigurationParameter(ticksPerRound);
00733       joints[i].setConfigurationParameter(torqueConst);
00734       joints[i].setConfigurationParameter(inverseDir);
00735       
00736       //Joint Trajectory Controller
00737       if(ethercatMaster.isThreadActive()){
00738         configfile->readInto(trajectory_p, jointName, "trajectory_controller_P");
00739         configfile->readInto(trajectory_i, jointName, "trajectory_controller_I");
00740         configfile->readInto(trajectory_d, jointName, "trajectory_controller_D");
00741         configfile->readInto(trajectory_imax, jointName, "trajectory_controller_I_max");
00742         configfile->readInto(trajectory_imin, jointName, "trajectory_controller_I_min");
00743         joints[i].trajectoryController.setConfigurationParameter(trajectory_p, trajectory_i, trajectory_d, trajectory_imax, trajectory_imin);
00744         joints[i].trajectoryController.setEncoderTicksPerRound(ticks);
00745         joints[i].trajectoryController.setGearRatio(gearRatio_numerator / gearRatio_denominator);
00746         joints[i].trajectoryController.setInverseMovementDirection(invdir);
00747         ethercatMasterWithThread->registerJointTrajectoryController(&(joints[i].trajectoryController), joints[i].getJointNumber());
00748       }
00749     }
00750 
00751 
00752     configfile->readInto(useGripper, "Gripper", "EnableGripper");
00753     
00754     if(useGripper){
00755     //Initializing Gripper
00756     configfile->readInto(slaveNumber, "JointTopology", "ManipulatorJoint5");
00757     this->gripper.reset(new YouBotGripper(slaveNumber));
00758     BarSpacingOffset barOffest;
00759     MaxTravelDistance maxDistance;
00760     MaxEncoderValue maxEncoder;
00761     GripperBarName BarName;
00762     double dummy = 0;
00763     int controllerType;
00764     double firmwareVersion;
00765     string barname;
00766     
00767     GripperFirmwareVersion gripperVersion;
00768     this->gripper->getConfigurationParameter(gripperVersion);
00769     gripperVersion.getParameter(controllerType, firmwareVersion);
00770     
00771     LOG(info) << "Gripper" << "\t\t Controller Type: " << controllerType << "  Firmware version: " << firmwareVersion;
00772 
00773     // Gripper Bar 1
00774     configfile->readInto(barname, "GripperBar1", "BarName");
00775     BarName.setParameter(barname);
00776     this->gripper->getGripperBar1().setConfigurationParameter(BarName);
00777     
00778     configfile->readInto(dummy, "GripperBar1", "BarSpacingOffset_[meter]");
00779     barOffest.setParameter(dummy * meter);
00780     this->gripper->getGripperBar1().setConfigurationParameter(barOffest);
00781     
00782     configfile->readInto(dummy, "GripperBar1", "MaxTravelDistance_[meter]");
00783     maxDistance.setParameter(dummy * meter);
00784     this->gripper->getGripperBar1().setConfigurationParameter(maxDistance);
00785     
00786     int maxenc = 0;
00787     configfile->readInto(maxenc, "GripperBar1", "MaxEncoderValue");
00788     maxEncoder.setParameter(maxenc);
00789     this->gripper->getGripperBar1().setConfigurationParameter(maxEncoder);
00790     
00791     int stallThreshold = 0;
00792     configfile->readInto(stallThreshold, "GripperBar1", "StallGuard2Threshold");
00793     StallGuard2Threshold threshold;
00794     threshold.setParameter(stallThreshold);
00795     this->gripper->getGripperBar1().setConfigurationParameter(threshold);
00796 
00797     bool stallGuardFilter = false;
00798     configfile->readInto(stallGuardFilter, "GripperBar1", "StallGuard2FilterEnable");
00799     StallGuard2FilterEnable filter;
00800     filter.setParameter(stallGuardFilter);
00801     this->gripper->getGripperBar1().setConfigurationParameter(filter);
00802     
00803     // Gripper Bar 2
00804     configfile->readInto(barname, "GripperBar2", "BarName");
00805     BarName.setParameter(barname);
00806     this->gripper->getGripperBar2().setConfigurationParameter(BarName);
00807     
00808     configfile->readInto(dummy, "GripperBar2", "BarSpacingOffset_[meter]");
00809     barOffest.setParameter(dummy * meter);
00810     this->gripper->getGripperBar2().setConfigurationParameter(barOffest);
00811     
00812     configfile->readInto(dummy, "GripperBar2", "MaxTravelDistance_[meter]");
00813     maxDistance.setParameter(dummy * meter);
00814     this->gripper->getGripperBar2().setConfigurationParameter(maxDistance);
00815 
00816     configfile->readInto(maxenc, "GripperBar2", "MaxEncoderValue");
00817     maxEncoder.setParameter(maxenc);
00818     this->gripper->getGripperBar2().setConfigurationParameter(maxEncoder);
00819     
00820     configfile->readInto(stallThreshold, "GripperBar2", "StallGuard2Threshold");
00821     threshold.setParameter(stallThreshold);
00822     this->gripper->getGripperBar2().setConfigurationParameter(threshold);
00823 
00824     configfile->readInto(stallGuardFilter, "GripperBar2", "StallGuard2FilterEnable");
00825     filter.setParameter(stallGuardFilter);
00826     this->gripper->getGripperBar2().setConfigurationParameter(filter);
00827     }
00828     
00829 
00830     return;

00832 }
